title: Transportation: Airport (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the Airport subcategory within Transportation. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.english: Please tell me how to get to Narita airport.
cards.romaji: Narita kuko no ikikata o oshiete kudasai.
cards.japanese: 成田空港の行き方を教えてください。

cards.english: There are no flights leaving the airport today, due to the stormy weather.
cards.romaji: Arashi no eikyo de kyo no furaito wa subete kyanseru saremashita.
cards.japanese: 嵐の影響で今日のフライトはすべてキャンセルされました。
